WorkItem.Description:
I'm sure I'm not the only one that finds it hard to quickly correlate number with sequence.
 
Here's a little something to help cycle analyzer reading
 
Illustration:
 
0123456789012
0000000000000: 26128.37 dps, 2990.708 mps
0000001000000: 17694.81 dps, 304.5175 mps, 3.1396 dpm tradeoff
0000001010000: 17123.53 dps, 133.6858 mps, 3.34413 dpm tradeoff
 
Basically, the first line easily directs the reader to line 1,2 etc. Towards the end since there's no space, 10 is 0 but it is easily correlated to 10 intuitively.
 
PS. This is destined for Rawr.Mage but for some reason I don't see a way to specify this on the report currently.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Mage] Reformat Cycle Analyzer for Easier Reading

Comments.Message: I don't get it, is this supposed to be a feature request or just information?
